reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I should preface my comments by saying that, overall, our room, in and of itself, was fine. It was clean, very spacious, and the beds were fairly comfortable. We were at the Casino to see a show, not to gamble, but the place was very crowded, so there was a lot of smoking in the casino. As a result, even though our room was on a non-smoking floor, the smoke tended to permeate the entire building, even the non-smoking areas. It seemed as though there was no filtration system working in the building.
reviews.title: Whoa, there's a lot of smoke

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If you are a smoker, this hotel is fine. If you are not a smoker and are sensitive to cigarette smoke, you may want to look elsewhere.
reviews.title: FABULOUS Winter Wonderland
anniversary
reviews.text: Wonderful, wonderful, wonderful. We stayed in the main hotel tower. Had a sweeping view of snow covered hills out our 14th floor room window. Enclosed pool area was fantastic. Rooms are spotless and well maintained. Thumbs up 100%.

We go here often. In the summer for the gambling and golf and the winter for the gambling and get-a-way. We always order breakfast in the room and it always astounds us that the eggs are still hot upon arrival. The rooms have always been neat and clean and the housekeeping staff have been very patient with us when we haven't vacated it in a timely manner. We find the price very fair and the staff helpful. We would have no problem staying at the Grand Casino Hotel again.
reviews.title: eh...

reviews.text: Unable to book online directly through the Grand Casino website. Stayed in the newly remodeled wing. Our room was nice-clean and comfy; however the hotel staff left much to be desired. The hotel staff, (check-in, valet, security, restaurant, bellman, night manager, etc) were not able to answer or help with the most simple of requests or questions. From what restaurant options do we have on-site to how late is the pool open.
reviews.title: OK considering the main activity is the Casino

likes.disliked: — Unless one is gambling, not much else here

reviews.text: i have stayed at the casino many tines over the last 6 yrs .since they have started the construction to expand i feel the over all quality of the casino has slipped. the food at the grill however is still good. large portions at reasonable prices. i play alot of slots and they have a excellent variety. i think they have tightened them up to pay for the construction. the comps have been scaled back for sure. i think the way to go is to stay across the street. clean rooms same price as the casino. they have a great pool and a free continental breakfast. just take the free shutle to the casino. we still like hinkley and are goining back in january
reviews.title: still like hinkley

likes.liked: — courteous check in people live bands seven nights a week
likes.disliked: — when you call to book room hard to get through and people on the phone are often rude

reviews.title: ugly interior and outside too
reviews.text: the housekeeping staff left my room dirty with the coffee pot had coffee in there already with out me making any. weird. the sheets were not changed and the previous occupant had had a little "accident" in them the night before. i was a stayover and i was missing some money after the maids left the next day. not alot, im no millionaire, but it was enough to be noticed. the pool area was inadequate and the towels were too small for my large body... im over 6'5" tall. the beds were too short. there were not enough non-smoking rooms and were then subject to a smoking room. phew. ish. i disdain smoke in all forms. i would not come back here if you paid me to.

reviews.title: Hinckley Grand Casino Hotel Trip Review
reviews.text: We arrived at the Grand Casino Hinckley Hotel in the early evening on 10/26/05. Check in was quick and painless. We (my sister and I) had a double queen room. I was very pleased with the room and hotel (and the price of $50 was a good value).
